00023 void WorkerBee::run(void* Args)
00024 {
00025         printf("Worker bee %i running\n", m_beeNumber);
00026 
00027         m_hive = static_cast<BeeHive*>(Args);
00028 
00029         while (1)
00030         {
00031             WorkerJob* newJob = m_hive->beeRequestNextJob();

00033             if (newJob != 0)
00034             {
00035

00037 
00038                     m_beeStatus = beeProcessing;
00039 
00040                 beeStatusAccessMutex.Unlock();

00043 
00044                     if (newJob->getStatus() == jobStatusError)
00045                     {
00046                         printf("Job exit with error %s\n", newJob->getErrorDetails());
00047                     }
00048

00050 
00051                     m_beeStatus = beeIdle;
00052 
00053                 beeStatusAccessMutex.Unlock();
00054             }
00055             else
00056             {
00057                 //Idle
00058             }
00059 
00060         }
